text: Guru Ladho Re Diwas is a festival celebrated among Sikhs, especially Labana Sikhs, commemorates finding of Guru Tegh Bahadur, The ninth Guru of Sikhs, by Baba Makhan Shah Labana.Guru Ladho Re-Diwas celebrated at Kotli Shah: Retrieved from Early Times News: Oct 23 Guru Ladho Re is phrase of Lubanki dialect which means Found the Right Guru. ==References== Category:Sikh terminology category:Labana
title: Guru Ladho Re Diwas
